name: Employees, Honey and Money
description:
If you play the web version, do it on fullscreen to see all the content.

Hire employees to produce honey, sell honey to earn money, and earn money to expand your recruiting and inventory capacity.

Be careful not to hit the walls or your employees if you do not want to lose money, and try to make at least one sale every 5 days or your employees may want to quit and your honey could expire.

Nothing stays forever, neither your employees, nor your product, nor the opportunities. Entrepreneurship means that only you will be there forever.

Move with Arrowkeys or with W A S D
